plot: A successful life coach is trying to live the 'perfect' life. But can he keep hiding from the dark secrets of his past?
title: A Life Like Mine
plot_es: A successful life coach is trying to live the 'perfect' life. But can he keep hiding from the dark secrets of his past?
plot_en: A successful life coach is trying to live the 'perfect' life. But can he keep hiding from the dark secrets of his past?
